title: HOAX HUNTERS Book One (2012) (Image) (Digital) (Dogmatix-Empire)
description:
Hoax Hunters Vol. 1: Murder, Death, and the Devil

In this first collection of the critically acclaimed series, the Hoax Hunters travel to Russia, the Louisiana Bayou, and 1984 New Jersey to seek out the truth behind supernatural events - and cover them up! The Hoax Hunters demonstrate the truth isn't out there. Includes the much sought after issue 0.

Collect HOAX HUNTERS 0-5!

Written by Michael Moreci, Steve Seeley
Art by Emilio Laiso, Axel Medellin, JM Ringuet

Genres: Science Fiction, Supernatural/Occult

161 Pages
Print Release Date: December 5, 2012
Digital Release Date: December 5, 2012
Age Rating: 12+ Only
